9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"The Prophet would walk when stoning the Jimar, both going and returning

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي رَمْىِ الْجِمَارِ رَاكِبًا وَمَاشِيًا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Stoning The Jimar While Riding (And Walking)
